text: wma yastawi al'aemaa walbsyr, wkdhlk laa yastawi almuminun aladhin yuqirrun bi'ana allah hu al'ilh alhaqu la sharik lh, wystjybwn lrslh wayaemalun bshreh, waljahdwn aladhin yunkirun 'ana allah hu al'ilh alhq, wykdhbwn rusulah wala yaemalun bshreh. qalilana maa tatadhakarun -ayha alnas- hijaj allh, ftetbrwn, wttezwn bha
